events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to the refunds department for further handling of the refund process.
Hello! I’m sorry for the inconvenience. I’m here to help you process your refund quickly and smoothly.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item you received to assist with the refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached are the photos showing the wrong item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that there are no further issues with your order.
